sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' export default function GameDetails() { let {id} = useParams() const [game,setGame]=useState() const [trailers,setTrailers]=useState() const src = trailers async function GetGameDetails(id){ let data = await axios.get(`https://api.rawg.io/api/games/${id}?key=ebd97901b6ca451482a89a2881456f4f`) setGame(data.data) console.log(data.data) } async function GetGameTrailers(id){ let data = await axios.get(`https://api.rawg.io/api/games/${id}/movies?key=ebd97901b6ca451482a89a2881456f4f`) setTrailers(data.data.results[0].data.max) } useEffect(()=>{ GetGameDetails(id) GetGameTrailers(id) },[]) return ( <> {game? <>
{game.name}

Where To buy

{game.stores.map((store,k)=>(

{store.store.name}

))}

Genres

released : {game.released}

rating : {game.rating}

Description {game.description_raw}

Tags
{game.tags.map((tag,index) => {tag.name}, )}
Trailers
:
GameDetails {id}
} ) }
